==========
notify-rs
==========

.. start short_desc

**Wrapper around notify-rust to show desktop notifications.**

.. end short_desc

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``notify-rs`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install notify-rs

.. end installation
